inputs.selection_motivation: Sustainability reframing in business underpins the development of ESG defense investment strategies that embed sustainability metrics into risk management frameworks, directly influencing the creation and adoption of ESG defense investment vehicles.
inputs.candidate_motivation: These topics are the strongest sustainability, ESG, and climate-policy related peers/influences that would plausibly interact with a Sustainability Reframing in Business knowledge graph, reflecting corporate strategy, risk, and policy dynamics.
